snippet: The figure has declined by a full percentage point over two months, and is now the lowest it has been since November 2008.
abstract: New York City unemployment rate falls to 6.8 percent, lowest level in nearly six years.
lead_paragraph: The figure has declined by a full percentage point over two months, and is now the lowest it has been since November 2008.

headline.main: New York City’s Unemployment Rate Fell to 6.8% in September
headline.print_headline: Unemployment Rate in City Dropped to 6.8% Last Month
